attributes.action: lets celebrate st georges day like the irish celebrate st paticks day.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i think we need to make st georges day a public holiday and we need to celebrate it like the irish celebrate st patricks day. there is nothing wrong with flying the flag of the country we were born in the country we are born in. we are born here so lets fly our flag.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
